SELECT SUM(goods_order_use_point) goodsOrderUsePoint
FROM shopping_goods_order
WHERE order_sheet_no = #{orderSheetNo} AND NOT goods_order_state IN ('취소','환불신청','환불완료')

SELECT total_id.id companyId , shopping_company.company_name companyName , shopping_company.company_ceo companyCeo , shopping_company.company_phone companyPhone , total_id.total_id_active active , total_id.createdate createdate FROM total_id INNER JOIN shopping_company ON total_id.id = shopping_company.company_id WHERE total_id.total_id_active = '비활성화' AND total_id.total_id_deactive_memo = '신규'

SELECT total_id.id companyId , booking_company.booking_company_name companyName , booking_company.booking_company_ceo companyCeo , booking_company.booking_company_phone companyPhone , total_id.total_id_active active , total_id.createdate createdate FROM total_id INNER JOIN booking_company ON total_id.id = booking_company.booking_company_id WHERE total_id.total_id_active = '비활성화' AND total_id.total_id_deactive_memo = '신규'

SELECT shopping_company.company_id companyId , shopping_company.company_id companyName , shopping_company.company_ceo companyCeo
, shopping_order_sheet.order_sheet_no orderSheetNo , shopping_order_sheet.customer_id customerId , shopping_order_sheet.order_sheet_state orderSheetState , shopping_order_sheet.order_sheet_waybill orderSheetWaybill , shopping_order_sheet.order_sheet_price orderSheetPrice , shopping_order_sheet.createdate
, shopping_goods.goods_name goodsName
FROM shopping_company INNER JOIN shopping_order_sheet ON shopping_company.company_id = shopping_order_sheet.company_id
INNER JOIN shopping_goods ON shopping_company.company_id = shopping_goods.company_id
WHERE shopping_company.company_name = #{companyName} ORDER BY createdate DESC;

SELECT booking_company.booking_company_id companyId , booking_company.booking_company_name companyName , booking_company.booking_company_ceo companyCeo
, booking.booking_no bookingNo , booking.customer_id customerId , booking.booking_date bookingDate , booking.booking_request_date bookingRequestDate , booking.booking_price bookingPrice , booking.booking_use_point bookingUsePoint , booking.booking_rank_discount bookingRankDiscount , booking.booking_total_price bookingTotalPrice , booking.booking_state bookingState , booking.booking_people bookingPeople
, booking_cancel.cancel_memo cancelMemo , booking_cancel.cancel_subject cancelSubject
, booking_product.booking_product_name bookingProductName , booking_product_option.booking_product_no bookingProductOptionNo , booking_product_option.booking_product_option_memo bookingProductOptionMemo , booking_product_option.booking_product_option_price bookingProductOptionPrice
FROM booking_company INNER JOIN booking ON booking_company.booking_company_id = booking.booking_company_id INNER JOIN booking_product ON booking_company.booking_company_id = booking_product.booking_company_id INNER JOIN booking_cancel ON booking.booking_no = booking_cancel.booking_no INNER JOIN booking_product_option ON booking_product.booking_product_no = booking_product_option.booking_product_no
WHERE booking_company.booking_company_name = #{companyName} ORDER BY bookingRequestDate DESC;

SELECT shopping_company.company_id companyId , shopping_company.company_id companyName , shopping_company.company_ceo companyCeo , shopping_goods.goods_no goodsNo , shopping_goods.type_no typeNo , shopping_goods.goods_name goodsName , shopping_goods.goods_price goodsPrice , shopping_goods.goods_active goodsActive , shopping_goods.goods_level goodsLevel , shopping_goods.updatedate updatedate , shopping_goods.createdate createdate , shopping_goods_option.goods_option_content goodsOptionContent , shopping_goods_option.goods_option_quantity goodsOptionQuantity , shopping_type.type_content typeContent , shopping_goods_img.goods_img_no goodsImgNo , shopping_goods_img.goods_img_origin_name goodsImgSaveName , shopping_goods_img.goods_img_origin_name goodsImgOriginName , shopping_goods_img.goods_img_level goodsImgLevel , shopping_goods_img.createdate imgCreatedate
FROM shopping_company INNER JOIN shopping_goods ON shopping_company.company_id = shopping_goods.company_id
INNER JOIN shopping_goods_option ON shopping_goods.goods_no = shopping_goods_option.goods_no
INNER JOIN shopping_type ON shopping_goods.type_no = shopping_type.type_no
INNER JOIN shopping_goods_img ON shopping_goods.goods_no = shopping_goods_img.goods_no
WHERE shopping_company.company_name = #{companyName} ORDER BY createdate DESC;

SELECT booking_company.booking_company_id companyId , booking_company.booking_company_name companyName , booking_company.booking_company_ceo companyCeo , booking_product.booking_product_no bookingProductNo , booking_product.booking_product_name bookingProductName , booking_product.booking_product_price bookingProductPrice , booking_product.booking_product_open bookingProductOpen , booking_product.booking_product_max_people bookingProductMaxPeople , booking_product.booking_product_min_people bookingProductMinPeople , booking_product.createdate createdate , booking_product_img.booking_product_img_no bookingProductImgNo , booking_product_img.booking_product_img_save_name bookingProductImgSaveName , booking_product_img.booking_product_img_origin_name bookingProductImgOriginName
FROM booking_company INNER JOIN booking_product ON booking_company.booking_company_id = booking_product.booking_company_id INNER JOIN booking_product_img ON booking_product.booking_product_no = booking_product_img.booking_product_no WHERE booking_company.booking_company_name = #{companyName} ORDER BY createdate DESC;

SELECT booking_company.booking_company_id companyId , booking_company.booking_company_name companyName , booking_company.booking_company_ceo companyCeo , booking_company.booking_company_phone companyPhone , total_id.total_id_active active , total_id.createdate createdate FROM booking_company INNER JOIN total_id ON booking_company.booking_company_id = total_id.id WHERE total_id.total_id_deactive_memo != '신규' OR total_id.total_id_deactive_memo IS NULL ORDER BY total_id.createdate
